homepage.title: How to participate?
homapage.instructions: Please donate by clicking on the button below before registering for the Challenge. We ask that you donate the equivalent of $5 or more, or whatever you can spare in your local currency. Through our Corporate Matching Program, Capco will also contribute to the money raised.
homepage.progress: View our Progress once the challenge starts
register.label: Register with Fitbit
